attributes.action: Put proper regulation in place to over see the banking and investment industry, in order to prevent another financial crisis like the one last year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UNLESS THE GOVERNMENT PUT BETTER REGULATION IN PLACE FOR THE BANKING AND INVESTMENT SECTOR, WE WILL BE FACED WITH OTHER SCANDALS AND CRISIS IN THE FUTURE.

BANKS THAT HAVE BEEN BAILED OUT BY THE TAX PAYER SHOULD BE LIMITED IN THE AMOUNT OF INDIVIDUAL BONUSES THEY CAN PAY TO £100,000, UNTIL THE TAX PAYERS MONEY IS REPAID IN FULL. SO THAT THE TAX PAYER DOES NOT FEEL CHEATED AND INSULTED BY THESE GREEDY INDIVIDUALS WHO CALL THEMSELVES BANKERS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
